system_prompt: You are a marketing assistant. Your task is to assist with creating marketing campaigns. Generate personalized marketing email copy for specific customer segments and campaign objectives. Output format : Marketing email with subject line, body text, CTA

inputs.target_segment: Small business owners, annual card spend $50K+, technology and software merchants
inputs.campaign_goal: Increase B2B payment adoption by 25% and migrate from ACH/check to Visa commercial cards
inputs.offer_details: Earn 2% cashback on software subscriptions and cloud services, plus $500 statement credit after $10K spend in first 3 months

inputs.target_segment: Gen Z cardholders (18-25), first credit card, limited credit history, digitally native
inputs.campaign_goal: Drive card activation within 7 days of issuance and achieve 5+ transactions in first month
inputs.offer_details: Exclusive access to presale concert tickets through Visa Entertainment, no annual fee, build credit with responsible use
inputs.tone: Conversational, empowering, mobile-first language, avoid financial jargon
